about_the_game:
Download the official Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 4K Texture Pack to enhance your game with the sharpest, most stunning textures the 41st millennium has to offer.

To install it, simply download this content and make sure to restart the game.

content_descriptors.notes: Gameplay consists of frequent combat scenarios with characters using their weapons to slash/stab enemies.

detailed_description:
Download the official Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 4K Texture Pack to enhance your game with the sharpest, most stunning textures the 41st millennium has to offer.

To install it, simply download this content and make sure to restart the game.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 - 4K Texture Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (1903 min)/11 64-bit
  • Processor: 12 CPU cores, AMD Ryzen 9 5900X / Intel Core i7-12700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 12 GB VRAM, AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT / Nvidia GeForce RTX 3080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 160 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD required. 30 FPS in 3840x2160 with the "Ultra" (4K) preset.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (1903 min)/11 64-bit
  • Processor: 12 CPU cores, AMD Ryzen 9 7900X3D / Intel Core i9-14900K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 12 GB VRAM, AMD Radeon RX 7900 XTX / Nvidia GeForce RTX 4070 SUPER
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 160 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD required. 60 FPS in 3840x2160 with the "Ultra" (4K) preset.

short_description: Download the official Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 4K texture pack to enhance your game with the sharpest, most stunning textures the 41st millennium has to offer. To install it, simply download this content and make sure to restart the game.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*, Czech, Japanese*, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Thai
*languages with full audio support
